about_the_game:
In Sky bound Hero, players take on the role of Aeris, a nimble and agile character gifted with the power of flight. Soaring through vibrant, dynamic landscapes, players must navigate vast skies. The objective is to collect as many power capsules as possible within a limited timeframe. Each level has its own set of challenges. With stunning graphics and immersive soundscapes, Skybound Hero offers a thrilling aerial adventure that tests reflexes and strategic planning. Can you help Aeris conquer the skies?

With a relaxed and epic feel - You are free to enjoy the game any way you see fit. The movement can be fast at times but the worlds itself are peaceful. Enjoy this game at your own pace.
detailed_description:
In Sky bound Hero, players take on the role of Aeris, a nimble and agile character gifted with the power of flight. Soaring through vibrant, dynamic landscapes, players must navigate vast skies. The objective is to collect as many power capsules as possible within a limited timeframe. Each level has its own set of challenges. With stunning graphics and immersive soundscapes, Skybound Hero offers a thrilling aerial adventure that tests reflexes and strategic planning. Can you help Aeris conquer the skies?

With a relaxed and epic feel - You are free to enjoy the game any way you see fit. The movement can be fast at times but the worlds itself are peaceful. Enjoy this game at your own pace.

name: Sky Bound Hero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit.
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 6-Core Xeon E5-2643 @ 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: An Epic open-world 3D adventure allowing you as the player to fly and collect power capsules within an amount of time. Explore epic alien landscapes as a superhero who can also shoot epic lasers through his eyes.
